text: The Belvedere Palace is a building in Vienna, Austria. It has two Baroque palaces (the Upper and Lower Belvedere), the Orangery, and the Palace Stables. The buildings are in a Baroque park landscape. It is in the third district in the city. The Belvedere museum is here. The grounds have many sculpture and iron gates. The Baroque palace was as a summer home for Prince Eugene of Savoy. == Gallery == Belvedere,_Vienna.jpg|Upper Belvedere Wien - Schloss Belvedere, oberes (1).JPG|Upper Belvedere Wien - Unteres Belvedere.JPG|Lower Belvedere Schloss Belvedere Wien 2007 Portal.jpg|Gates of Belvedere AT-68612 Oberes Belvedere Außenansicht 05.JPG|Upper Belvedere Vienna - Belvedere Palace - 6957.jpg|Upper Belvedere interior Belvedere Gärten und Blick nach Wien.
